body_html:
No, current CI runs outside docker, because we still try to support ubuntu 14, and there is no nvidia docker containers for ubuntu 14.
We will also soon remove all docker containers under tools/ci_build
Could you try using the devel-gpu container here?
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/docker

body:
No, current CI runs outside docker, because we still try to support ubuntu 14, and there is no nvidia docker containers for ubuntu 14.
We will also soon remove all docker containers under `tools/ci_build`
Could you try using the devel-gpu container here?
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/docker
